name: The Adventures of Sinbad
overview: The Adventures of Sinbad is an educational reading program with a bonus tile-matching game. It contains several short stories about Sinbad the Sailor with corresponding reading comprehension questions. Additionally, there is a tile-matching game for one or two players. Players take turns guessing two tiles from a 4x4 grid, with pictures from Sinbad's adventures. The player who achieves the most matches is the winner.
